blogPost.excerpt: ⚡ The Hashnode Blog Cards is a set of GET requests which will fetch the Blogs from your Hashnode ids with few parameters and will create SVG cards to bring 😎 awesomeness to your blog links. 🎉 Github link https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
blogPost.body: ⚡ The Hashnode Blog Cards is a set of GET requests which will fetch the Blogs from your Hashnode ids with few parameters and will create SVG cards to bring 😎 awesomeness to your blog links. 🎉 Github link https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
blogPost.title: Hashnode Blog Cards - Replace your Hashnode Blog links with Blogs Cards.
blogPost.author: Sourav Dey

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一组GET请求，它将通过少量参数从你的Hashnode ids中获取博客，并将创建SVG卡，为你的博客链接带来😎惊艳。🎉 Github 链接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 将您的Hashnode博客链接替换为博客卡。

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一組GET請求，它將通過少量參數從你的Hashnode ids中獲取博客，並將創建SVG卡，爲你的博客鏈接帶來😎驚豔。🎉 Github 鏈接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 將您的Hashnode博客鏈接替換爲博客卡。

previous.excerpt: A Powerful Mac* App to... • zoom into pixels • measure angles & distances • sample colors and maintain palettes • check alignments • real-time color-blindness and color-contrast • take snapshots • real-time distances and bounding boxes..and much, much more.
previous.title: QuickLens - Inspect the UI of apps, illustrations & websites like a PRO!

localize.description: 一款功能强大的Mac*应用程序，用于... - 缩放像素 - 测量角度和距离 - 采样颜色和维护调色板 - 检查对齐 - 实时色盲和色彩对比 - 拍摄快照 - 实时距离和边界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像专业人员一样检查应用程序、插图和网站的用户界面!

localize.description: 一款功能強大的Mac*應用程序，用於... - 縮放像素 - 測量角度和距離 - 採樣顏色和維護調色板 - 檢查對齊 - 實時色盲和色彩對比 - 拍攝快照 - 實時距離和邊界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像專業人員一樣檢查應用程序、插圖和網站的用戶界面!

next.excerpt: Squat is also called full squat. It is one of the most complex and practiced movements in bodybuilding. It is also a movement in powerlifting competitions. This is an app that automatically records the number of squats through sensors.
next.title: Daily Squat Workout App - Fitness app to track your squat workout

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比赛中最复杂、练习量最大的动作之一。它也是力量举比赛中的一个动作。这是一款通过传感器自动记录下蹲次数的应用。
localize.tagline: 追踪你的下蹲训练的健身应用

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比賽中最複雜、練習量最大的動作之一。它也是力量舉比賽中的一個動作。這是一款通過傳感器自動記錄下蹲次數的應用。
localize.tagline: 追蹤你的下蹲訓練的健身應用
